chunk:
Codex Labs Antü Skin Barrier Serum

Brand: Codex Labs

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Aqua (Water), Propanediol, Coco-Caprylate , Lactobacillus Ferment , Glycerin , Annona Cherimola (Cherimoya) Fruit Extract, Polyglyceryl-6 Stearate, Lactobacillus, Silybum Marianum (Milk Thistle) Ethyl Ester, Aristotelia Chilensis Leaf Extract, Buddleja Globosa Leaf Extract, Ugni Molinae Leaf Extract, Pfaffia Paniculata Root Extract,

Stearate, Lactobacillus, Silybum Marianum (Milk Thistle) Ethyl Ester, Aristotelia Chilensis Leaf Extract, Buddleja Globosa Leaf Extract, Ugni Molinae Leaf Extract, Pfaffia Paniculata Root Extract, Ptychopetalum Olacoides Bark/Stem Extract, Lilium Candidum (White Lily) Flower Extract, Hydrolyzed Hibiscus Esculentus Extract, Dextrin, Tocopherol,

Leaf Extract, Pfaffia Paniculata Root Extract, Ptychopetalum Olacoides Bark/Stem Extract, Lilium Candidum (White Lily) Flower Extract, Hydrolyzed Hibiscus Esculentus Extract, Dextrin, Tocopherol, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract, Cedrus Deodara Wood Oil, Cetearyl Alcohol, Polyglyceryl-6 Behenate, Benzyl Alcohol, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside,

Esculentus Extract, Dextrin, Tocopherol, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract, Cedrus Deodara Wood Oil, Cetearyl Alcohol, Polyglyceryl-6 Behenate, Benzyl Alcohol, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Sodium Phytate, Sodium Citrate, Xanthan Gum, Sclerotium Gum, Phenylpropanol, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid

Directions: Apply a small amount daily to cleansed skin. Use on its own or as a base layer prior to facial oils and/or creams.

Warnings: AVOID DIRECT CONTACT WITH EYES. DISCONTINUE USE IF SIGNS OF IRRITATION APPEAR.
